speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me when you first started experiencing double vision, difficulty climbing stairs, and upper limb weakness?

speaker: Patient
text: "I started noticing it about a month ago, to be honest, I was working on a project and had to type for a few hours straight. The next morning, I had trouble seeing things clearly, and then it started affecting my daily activities like climbing stairs and brushing my hair."

speaker: Doctor
text: When did these symptoms first start occurring, and have they been constant or have they come and gone over time?
